sentences.english: Heng Shui Laobaigan is one of the most famous liquors in Hebei province and never goes to the head.
sentences.chinese: 衡水老白乾是河北省最有名的白酒，而且喝了不上頭。

sentences.english: No sooner did our English lessons begin than our heads began to nod.
sentences.chinese: 我們一上英文課，瞌睡蟲就開始爬上頭。

sentences.english: Puppet laughed at those broken lines above him on the high ropes.
sentences.chinese: 木偶得意的望著上頭斷了的懸線大笑。

sentences.english: They serve it in little metal cups and strew rose leaves upon it.
sentences.chinese: 他們以小巧的金屬杯子盛酒，並在上頭撒上玫瑰花瓣。

sentences.english: The red peach blooms high and low;
They greenlit it, and we started writing scenes just to cast the thing.
sentences.chinese: 上頭審覈通過，我們就開始寫些場景，開始建組。

sentences.english: During the day to see "Lotus Just Buds, dragonfly stand on top of already."
sentences.chinese: 白天看“小荷才露尖尖角，早有蜻蜓立上頭”。

sentences.english: The debutante's photograph was at the head of the society page.
sentences.chinese: 那位初進社交界少女的照片登在社會版的最上頭。

sentences.english: He Junfeng query director, why want to give students wear a top cage?
sentences.chinese: 賀俊峯質問主任，爲什麼要給學員戴上頭籠？

sentences.english: As I looked, 'thrones were set in place, and the Ancient of Days took his seat.
sentences.chinese: 我觀看，見有寶座設立，上頭坐着亙古常在者。

sentences.english: Can you afford to anger those above you?
sentences.chinese: 你把上頭的人激怒了，後果你能承擔嗎？

sentences.english: Its doors were of powdered lacquer, and bulls and peacocks were wrought on them in raised and polished gold.
sentences.chinese: 門上上了金漆，上頭還有精緻的公牛和孔雀的金浮雕。

sentences.english: Red peach flowers cover a high mountain.
This ones straight from the top.
sentences.chinese: 這是直接由上頭交卸的。

sentences.english: The white house is on enjoying, really fee to devote to think.
sentences.chinese: 白家在享受上頭，真是費盡心思。

sentences.english: The pink peach flowers crown the mountaintop.
